name: Beef goulash with Carlsbad dumplings
ingredients: Bay leaf, Crushed cumin, Whole beef shoulder, Carlsbad dumpling, Sliced onion, Butter, Milk, Ground nutmeg, Black pepper, Flat-leaf parsley, Tomato paste, Rolls, Fat, Sweet paprika, Salt, Dried marjoram, Egg
steps: Coarsely chop the onion. Once the meat is soft, mix the marjoram in the palms of your hands into the stew, add salt and pepper as needed, stir and cook for 5 minutes. Let the finished stew rest for at least 15 minutes, then return the casserole to a higher heat, add the meat and sauté, stirring frequently, until the bottom of the casserole has evaporated all the juices that the meat has released. Once there is only fat left on the bottom of the casserole, turn the heat down to medium and sauté the meat for another 5 minutes, stirring frequently, until golden brown. Stir everything thoroughly with a flat spoon from the bottom of the casserole to dissolve the mixture. Bring to the boil, cover with a lid, turn the heat down to low and simmer on a very low heat.

name: Cake with nuts
ingredients: Cocoa, Coffee suitable for this dish, Coarse flour, Cocoa powder, Flour, Milk, Butter, Flour, Eggs, Walnuts
steps:
The egg white snow must be so stiff that it does not fall out of the bowl when turned upside down.

After baking, stick a skewer into the cake. If a sticky batter appears on the skewer, bake the cake for another 5 minutes and repeat the test with the skewer.

If the cake cannot be turned out, cover the inverted mould with a cold wet cloth. After a while
it will release itself. However, you won't need such help if you grease the mould thoroughly
with lard instead of oil or butter. You can also dust it with breadcrumbs instead of flour.

You can add raisins to the dough.

You can brush the still hot cake with melted butter and immediately sprinkle with icing sugar.Pour the batter into the prepared tin, place in the preheated oven and bake for 35-40 minutes. After baking, immediately turn the cake out of the tin onto a wire rack. After cooling, sprinkle the cake with icing sugar., Heat the oven to 160 °C. Heat the butter in a saucepan. Bake the

name: Pea cream soup
ingredients: Onion, Semolina sugar, Chicken broth, Butter, Mint, Frozen peas, Black pepper, Leek, Whipping cream (min. 31%), Salt, Sour cream
steps:
If you want the soup to get a fresh green colour, you must not cook the peas for a long time, as they turn grey when cooked for longer.

You can serve the soup with toasted croutons made from rolls or buns, finely chop the leeks and onions. Heat 70 g butter in a saucepan over medium heat, add the leeks and onions, stir, cover with a lid and simmer for 3 minutes. Stir again, add the mint leaves, the remaining butter and blend the soup thoroughly in a blender. Then strain it through a colander into a clean pot. Just reheat the soup briefly before serving and season with salt if necessary., Add the frozen peas, increase the heat and stir thoroughly for 2 minutes. Pour in the boiling stock, season with salt and pepper, add sugar and bring to the boil. Add the sweet and sour cream, bring to the boil again and remove the saucepan from the heat.

name: Chicken soup with coconut milk
ingredients: Fresh Coriander, Red Chilli, Garlic, Spring Onion, Coconut Milk, Skinless Chicken Breast, Chicken Broth, Lime, Fish Sauce, Salt, Brown Sugar Cane, Ginger
steps: Remove the meat from the pot and cut into 1 cm thick slices. Strain the finished broth through a fine sieve into a clean pot, bring the seasoned broth to a boil, add the ginger and coconut milk and bring to a boil again. Add the chopped coriander, the chopped meat from the seasoned stock and the sugar, stir, bring to the boil and cook for 3 minutes, Add the lime juice, stir, add the fish sauce, bring to the boil again and cook for a further 3 minutes. Add salt to taste. Add the spring onions and chilli, stir and remove from the heat., Put the ingredients for the stock in a saucepan, bring to the boil, skim off the foam and cook uncovered over a low heat for 15 minutes. Then remove from the heat and let stand for 20 minutes. The rest of the seasoned broth can be frozen or more can be prepared.

name: Chicken broth
ingredients: Bay leaf, Black pepper whole, Fresh thyme, Garlic, Onion, Chicken wings, Chicken necks, Chicken skeleton, Carrots, Allspice whole, Flat leaf parsley, Leek, Celery stalks, Salt
steps:
Strain the finished broth through a fine sieve and boil to a volume of about 3 litres. Once the broth has cooled, skim the fat from the surface and discard it.Rinse the necks and wings thoroughly under running water and place them in a large pot with the skins and browned skeletons. Cover with water so that everything is submerged and bring to the boil. Skim off any foam that forms on the surface. Add the pepper, salt, allspice, thyme and bay leaf. Turn the heat down to low and cook for 75 minutes. Add the chopped vegetables, onion, garlic and flat-leaved parsley. Bring to the boil over a medium heat, reduce the heat to minimum, skim off the foam and cook for 45 minutes.

Once cooled, remove the fat from the broth and refrigerate the broth or put it in the fridge for a few minutes.

name: Couscous with dried fruit
ingredients: Star anise, Lemon, Pomegranate, Couscous, Almond slices, Mint, Unsalted pistachios, Olive oil, Black pepper, Pine nuts, Flat leaf parsley, Raisins, Shredded coconut, Salt, Dried apricots, Cinnamon roll
steps: Bring 600 ml of water to the boil with the star anise, cinnamon and 1 tablespoon of salt. Once the water starts to bubble, pour it into the bowl with the couscous. Add 2 tablespoons of olive oil, mix thoroughly, cover with a lid or inverted plate and leave to stand until all the water has been absorbed and the couscous is soft. Take out the star anise and cinnamon and discard them, cut open the pomegranate and use a spoon to scoop out the seeds. Remove any white pulp. Finely chop the apricots and coarsely chop the pistachios. Stir the pine seeds, pistachios, almond slices, dried fruit, coconut, chopped herbs, pomegranate seeds and lemon zest and juice into the finished couscous. Stir in the remaining olive oil, season with salt and pepper to taste, and toss to mix.Place the couscous in a large bowl.Heat a skillet over medium heat and dry fry the shredded coconut, stirring constantly, until light golden. Place the finished coconut in a bowl to cool.

name: Szeged goulash
ingredients: Garlic, Onion, Smooth flour, Cauliflower dumplings, Ground cumin, Sauerkraut, Lard, Sweet paprika, Bacon, Salt, Pork shoulder (whole or cubed), Suitable beer, Sour cream
steps: Cut the meat into 2 cm cubes. Cut the bacon into 1 cm cubes. Finely chop the onion. Squeeze the cabbage out of the brine and roughly slice. Peel and crush the garlic, add the fried bacon and cabbage and simmer for another 30 minutes or until the meat is tender. Stir occasionally. Add the sour cream, stir and cook over low heat for 3 minutes. Add salt to taste, reduce heat to below half, add sweet paprika and sauté for 1 minute. Add the flour and stir fry for 1 minute. Add 1 teaspoon salt, 1.4 litres of water and bring to the boil. Lower the heat to below one-third, cover with a lid and simmer for 30 minutes. Add the lard and caraway seeds to the casserole and stir. Reduce the heat to half, add the onion and sauté, stirring occasionally, for 15 minutes. Add the meat, increase the heat and sear for 5 minutes, stirring frequently. Add the garlic and stir

name: Meatloaf
ingredients: Baguette, Potatoes type A, B, C, Garlic, Bread, Onion, Crushed cumin, Milk, Ground beef, Ground pork, Black pepper , Rolls, Salt, Dried marjoram, Eggs, Suitable beer
steps:
Place the minced meat in a larger bowl, add the soaked bread, the remaining ingredients and mix thoroughly. With wet hands, shape the meat mixture into a doughnut. Smooth it, brush the surface with water and place in a baking dish. Beef only tends to be dry and crumbles. You can thicken the meatloaf mixture with breadcrumbs or add a little water as needed.

Freshly crushed cumin will give the meatloaf a stronger and better taste than bought ground. You can beat it in an old mortar.

Literally flatten the meatloaf so that the meat mass is well combined and no air bubbles remain. The baked meatloaf should be soft, springy and juicy.

You can add thyme or red pepper to the meatloaf to taste, or you can cover the surface with slices of bacon.

You can add hard-boiled eggs to the meatloaf before baking, or add diced cubes of bacon and onion.

name: Indian chicken
ingredients: Whole chicken, Curry spices, Butter, Hot peppers, Black pepper , Rice, Sweet peppers, Creamy white yoghurt, Salt, Wine suitable for poultry meat
steps:
Mix the yoghurt thoroughly with the spices and salt.The chicken must be left to rest in the marinade for at least 12 hours, thanks to which the dish will acquire its unique flavour.

The chicken is best with steamed rice. Then brush it thoroughly with the spiced yoghurt all over (including the cuts). Place the chicken in a bowl, cover with cling film and put in the fridge overnight., Place the butter cut into cubes on a baking tray, add hot water to a height of 0,5 cm and place the chicken in the tray with all the yoghurt in which the chicken has been marinated., Place the tray in a preheated oven and bake for 75 minutes, or until the thigh bone is cooked through without resistance. During baking, baste the chicken several times with the fat., Heat the oven to 180 °C.

name: Beef spit on mushrooms
ingredients: Potatoes type A, B, C, Onions, Smooth flour, Beef roast, Beef broth, Butter, Vinegar, Black pepper , Flat leaf parsley, Rice, Fat, Fresh mushroom mix, Salt, Dried mushrooms, Pasta, Wine suitable for beef
steps:
Clean the fresh mushrooms, roughly chop the larger ones, leave the smaller ones whole. In a non-stick frying pan on high heat, fry 30 g of butter and fry the mushrooms until golden brown. Just 2-3 minutes. Season with salt and pepper and add them to the mushrooms after about 30 minutes of stewing. Pour in the rest of the broth, cover with a lid and simmer over very low heat until tender. Salt and pepper the meat slices and dust both sides with flour., The length of time for which you want to simmer the sprats depends on the type, quality and age of the meat. For example, you will stew the roasts from a bull for a shorter time than the roasts from a cow. The meat from a bull or heifer is also tastier.

Sauté fresh mushrooms in a larger pan, so they don't release water and start to stew.

By the time you add the cold butter to the sauce, the sauce must no longer be boiling.

It's a good idea to cut the butter into smaller cubes - gradually stir them into the sauce.
Butter

name: Chicken on paprika
ingredients: Garlic, Lemon, Caterpillar dumplings, Sliced onion, Chicken breast without skin, Chicken broth, Butter, Black pepper, Tomato puree, Vegetable oil, Rice, Sweet paprika, Bacon, Whipping cream (min. 31%), Salt, Pasta, Wine suitable for poultry meat, Jerky
steps:
Return the meat to the casserole, pour in half the stock and stir with a flat spoon from the bottom to cook the drippings back into the liquid. Pour in the rest of the stock and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat to half and bring the liquid to a simmer at half volume, You can add 1 teaspoon of smoked paprika and a pinch of hot paprika to the sauce.

Always add the ground paprika to the rendered fat.

Serve with pasta cakes, rice or dumplings. Coarsely chop the onion and garlic. Cut the bacon into 1 cm wide fries, add the onion and garlic and sauté until light golden. Add the tomato paste and sauté for 1 minute. Add the sweet paprika, stir and sauté for 20 seconds., Pour in the cream, bring to the boil, add the cress and stir well. Cook on medium heat for 4 minutes. Add lemon juice, stir, remove from heat and season with salt and pepper to taste.

name: Roast duck with red cabbage and potato dumplings
ingredients: Potato starch, Boiling potatoes type B or C, Red cabbage, Onion, Semolina sugar, Smooth flour, Coarse flour, Duck, Whole cumin, Vinegar, Lard, Salt, Eggs, Suitable beer
steps:
Finely chop the onion. Heat 60 g of lard in a saucepan over high heat, add the onion and let it foam. Add the caraway seeds and fry the onions, stirring frequently, until light golden in colour. Add the cabbage, stir and pull it to one side so that the bottom of the casserole is partially visible. Sprinkle the sugar on top and stir briefly in the fat. Once the sugar starts to turn golden, mix it thoroughly with the cabbage. Add the salt, pour in the vinegar and mix thoroughly. Cover with a lid, turn the heat down to low and simmer until the cabbage is tender. During the stewing, stir the cabbage occasionally and cover with the lid again. Prick only the skin at the beginning of the roasting process to allow the excess fat to drain out.

Do you know how to tell when the duck is cooked? When you pick it up by the thigh bone, it should turn slightly.

You can put the rendered duck fat in a

name: Potato pancakes
ingredients: Potatoes type B, Celery, Freshly crushed pepper, Garlic, Onion, Crushed cumin, Smooth flour, Butter, Carrots, Parsley, Flat leaf parsley, Salt, Dried marjoram, Dried mushrooms
steps:
Cut the onion, root vegetables and potatoes into 1 cm cubes. Peel and finely chop the garlic. Soak the dried mushrooms in water to soften them., Salt and pepper the finished soup to taste and add the chopped parsley. It caramelizes faster than root vegetables. If you sautéed it with the vegetables at the beginning, it would burn.

In season, of course, use fresh mushrooms. 300 g of a mixture of cleaned and chopped mushrooms will do. Cut them into larger pieces and sauté them in a hot pan on a higher heat until golden just after the vegetables. Only then add the onions and proceed.

Once you have dusted the vegetables with flour, be sure to turn the heat down to a third and stir with the stock thus prepared. Don't worry about any drippings forming at the bottom of the pot. As soon as you add the water, the liquor will gradually dissolve. Be careful not to blacken the liquor,

name: Potato dumplings round
ingredients: Potato starch, Potatoes boiling type B or C, Coarse flour, Lard, Salt, Eggs
steps:
In a larger pot, boil well-salted water for dumplings.On a floured table or a rolling pin, shape the dough into round dumplings with a diameter of 5 cm and immediately place them in the salted boiling water. Cook for 6 -7 minutes. Remove the finished dumplings from the water with a perforated ladle and place them on a baking tray with warmed lard, in which they are coated so that they do not turn brown. Therefore, add the flour gradually to obtain the ideal consistency. Potato dough tends to thin out, so you must work quickly.

Heat the cold dumplings in a saucepan with a little water, bring it to the boil, put the steamer with the dumplings in it and cover the saucepan with a lid.

You can leave the dumplings to cool and freeze if necessary.

For this dish, you need boiling type C potatoes. The final quantity of 1 kg is the amount of potatoes cooked, peeled and cooled in the skin.

Before you start making the potato dough, the potatoes must be

name: Potato salad
ingredients: Potatoes, cooking type A, Celery, Sliced onions, Mayonnaise, Carrots, Pickles, Black pepper , Parsley, Full fat mustard, Salt, Eggs
steps:
As soon as a fork or kitchen needle can be stuck into the potatoes without resistance, the potatoes are soft.

Do not boil the potatoes for the salad, otherwise they will fall apart in the salad. The same applies to root vegetables.

The ideal salad potatoes are 'bush rolls'.

You can also add a small peeled and finely grated apple to the salad.

Instead of cucumber liqueur, you can flavour the salad with lemon juice. Add mayonnaise, mustard, 2 teaspoons salt, 1 teaspoon freshly ground pepper and mix. Pour in 2 tablespoons of cucumber liqueur and stir. Carefully stir in the chopped eggs. Season with salt and refrigerate for at least 4 hours (preferably overnight), cut the cooked vegetables into 1 cm cubes and place in a large bowl. Chop the onion finely and add to a large bowl.

name: Bryndzové gnocchi
ingredients: Potatoes type B, Bryndza, Onions, Milk, Semi-coarse flour, Lard, Bacon, Whipping cream (min. 31%), Salt, Eggs, Suitable beer, Sour cream
steps: Finely grate the potatoes. Put them in a bowl and squeeze out the water. Add the flour, eggs and salt and knead the dough. In a large saucepan, bring a large amount of water to the boil., Spread some of the gnocchi dough on a wet chopping board, place it on the edge of the pot of boiling water and use a paring knife to cut off (chop) the gnocchi over the edge of the board. Once they float to the surface, wait 20 seconds and use a flat strainer to remove them and place them in a bowl. Do not cook the gnocchi all at once, but roughly in thirds, so that part of it is not overcooked and part undercooked. Cut the bacon into 1 cm cubes., Cover each batch in the bowl with some of the crumbled bryndza, which will melt on them. Pour the hot topping of cream, milk, onion and bacon over the last layer. Stir lightly. On the plate, season with a spoonful of sour cream. If you have only new potatoes, add 2 tablespoons of starch to the batter.

name: Red cabbage
ingredients: Red cabbage, Onion, Semolina sugar, Whole cumin, Vinegar, Lard, Salt
steps: If you are preparing red cabbage with duck, use an equal amount of duck fat instead of pork fat in this dish. Just collect it during the roasting of the duck., Finely chop the onion. Heat 60 g of lard in a saucepan over a high heat, add the onion and let it foam. Add the caraway seeds and fry the onions, stirring frequently, until light golden in colour. Add the cabbage, stir and pull it to one side so that the bottom of the casserole is partially visible. Sprinkle the sugar on top and stir briefly in the fat. Once the sugar starts to turn golden, mix it thoroughly with the cabbage. Add the salt, pour in the vinegar and mix thoroughly. Cover with a lid, turn the heat down to low and simmer until the cabbage is tender. Once the cabbage is soft, remove the lid, increase the heat and stir the cabbage for a further 3 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in the remaining lard,

name: Chocolate cake with apples
ingredients: Coarse flour, Apple, Cocoa, Coffee suitable for this dish, Butter, Milk, Caster sugar, Semi-coarse flour, Baking powder, Eggs
steps:
Let the finished bun cool in the tin for 5 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack and let cool completely.Serve with whipped cream.

You can tell when the dough is baked by sticking a skewer into the centre of the bun and pulling it out, it will stay dry. If there is raw dough on the skewer when you pull it out, bake for a while., Pour the dough into the tin, place in the preheated oven and bake for 20 minutes., Preheat the oven to 175 °C. Grease the tin with butter and dust with flour., Place all the ingredients except the apples in the bowl of a food processor and mix on medium speed for 3 minutes. Add the apples, reduce the speed and mix for 1 minute., Cut the cores out of the apples and cut the apples into 1 cm cubes.

name: Ducati buns with vanilla cream
ingredients: Fresh yeast, Caster sugar, Flour, Butter, Milk, Lard, Whipping cream (min. 31%), Salt, Domestic rum, Vanilla pod, Egg, Egg yolk
steps: Crumble the yeast into a bowl, add 1 teaspoon of sugar, 2 tablespoons of lukewarm milk and leave at room temperature for 10 minutes to form a sourdough starter. Make a smooth dough, dust with flour and leave to rise in a warm place for 1 hour until the dough has at least doubled in volume. The cream will thicken as it cools - stir it a few times to keep it smooth., Place the balls side by side in a greased baking dish. Brush each one with melted lard on all sides. Place the baking dish in a preheated oven and bake for 20 minutes until golden brown., The dough for the buns needs to be worked through really thoroughly - you have to use a rolling pin to sort of puff it up to get the air in. After a while, the dough starts to peel away from the sides of the bowl. The dough is ready to

name: Guacamole
ingredients: Avocado, Freshly Crushed Pepper, Fresh Coriander, Red Chilli Pepper, Garlic, Cherry Tomatoes, Lime, Nachos, Olive Oil, Salt, Sour Cream
steps:
You can mash the avocado with a fork the whole amount. The guacamole will have a softer texture.

You can add a teaspoon of Dijon mustard to the guacamole.
 
Serve with nachos, cut the avocado in half and remove the pit. Spoon out the flesh from the skin and cut into small cubes. Put them in a bowl and mash half of them with a fork, add oil, sour cream, lime juice, garlic, chilli and coriander. Finally, stir in the chopped tomatoes. Season with salt and pepper to taste, stir and chill in the fridge for a while. Finely chop the flesh. Crush or finely chop the garlic. Cut open the chilli pepper, remove the seeds and chop finely.

name: Goulash soup
ingredients: Potatoes type A, B, C, Garlic, Onion, Crushed cumin, Smooth flour, Beef neck or shoulder meat, Beef broth, Black pepper , Fat, Sweet paprika, Salt, Dried marjoram
steps:
Cut the potatoes into 1 cm cubes and add them to the soup together with the dried marjoram. Cook the soup over a low heat for 15 minutes or until the potatoes are soft.
Stir the soup occasionally to prevent it from sticking. Once the liquid has boiled off and only fat remains in the bottom of the saucepan, add the flour, reduce the heat to a third and stir fry for 2 minutes. Add the garlic and paprika, stir thoroughly and pour in the broth. Finely chop the onion and garlic. Heat the lard in a saucepan over a medium heat and fry the onion in it, stirring frequently, until golden brown. Add the cumin and meat, stir and sauté until all the juices that the meat has released have evaporated. Stir frequently, mix, season with salt and pepper and bring to the boil. Turn the heat back down to one-third and simmer over low heat for 20 minutes.

name: Hummus
ingredients: Freshly crushed pepper, Garlic, Lemon juice, Canned chickpeas, Nachos, Virgin olive oil, Ground cumin, Sweet paprika, Salt, Tahini
steps:
Drain the chickpeas and put them in a blender. Add lemon juice, garlic, cumin, paprika and tahini
and blend until smooth. Then gradually add 3 tablespoons of oil while blending. Season with salt and pepper., Drizzle the hummus in a bowl or on a plate with the remaining olive oil., You can add an extra teaspoon of tahini.

Serve with nachos, grissini or salty crackers.

name: Fluffy dumplings
ingredients: Potato starch, Potatoes type A, B, C, Coarse flour, Butter, Salt, Eggs
steps:
Put more water in the pot to boil. Salt the water., Prepare dumplings from potatoes boiling type B or C.

Cook dumplings in melted lard or butter, do not peel so., Cook dumplings for 6-7 minutes. When they are done, they will float to the surface. Remove them to a bowl with melted lard or butter, to taste, and mix., Using a soup spoon, form dumplings in the palm of your wet palm into larger dumplings, which you place in salted boiling water., Peel the boiled potatoes, grate coarsely and place in a bowl. Peel the raw potatoes, grate finely and add to the boiled potatoes. Add 1 teaspoon salt, the egg, coarse flour and starch. Mix a thicker dough.

name: Apple strudel
ingredients: Semolina sugar, Plain flour, Apple, Coffee suitable for this dish, Butter, Caster sugar, Vegetable oil, Raisins marinated in groundnuts, Ground cinnamon, Breadcrumbs, Salt, Eggs, Walnuts
steps: To make the dough as thin as possible, pull it out by hand. Transfer the dough to a clean cloth dusted with flour and, with the backs of the hands placed under the dough, pull it out in all directions with careful movements, When the sheet is perfectly thin, cut off the thicker edges, sprinkle it with breadcrumbs, evenly cover with grated apples, sprinkle with cinnamon mixed with sugar, sieved raisins and walnuts. Make a well in the middle, crack an egg into it, pour in the oil and a little warm water and season with salt. Slowly work the flour towards the well and gradually work into a smooth, medium-stiff dough. If it is too stiff, add water, if too thin, add flour. Work the dough until it is smooth and shiny and no longer sticky. Then shape into a loaf, wrap in cling film and leave to rest in the fridge for 30 minutes. Roll out each dough

name: Meatballs
ingredients: Potatoes type A, B, C, Fresh marjoram, Freshly crushed pepper, Garlic, Onion, Beef neck or shoulder, Milk, Ground beef, Ground pork, Rolls, Lard, Breadcrumbs, Salt, Whole or sliced pork neck, Suitable beer
steps:
Peel and crush the garlic, finely chop the onion and marjoram. Grind the well chilled pork and beef together and place in a bowl. Add 1 teaspoon of salt, half a teaspoon of freshly ground pepper, garlic, onion, marjoram and finally a soaked roll with milk. The meatballs will then be juicier and will not crumble.

The meat dough must remain very cold throughout the cooking time. Milk too. This is the only way to achieve juicy meatballs. Even the meat you are grinding must be thoroughly chilled.

Use whole milk, it has a better taste.

If you only have dried marjoram, use one tablespoon. With wet hands, shape the dough into meatballs and coat them in breadcrumbs, which you gently press into the meat with your palms. Leave to rest briefly.

name: Kohlrabi soup
ingredients: Freshly ground pepper, Onion, Flour, Onion, Onion, Chicken or vegetable stock, Butter, Nutmeg, Flat-leaf parsley, Whipping cream (min. 31%), Salt
steps:
Grate the kohlrabi coarsely. Finely chop the onion, use fresh kohlrabi, old ones are woody.

Do not let the onions brown when roasting. The soup will change the taste.

Chicken stock is best for making this soup, but you can also make a vegetarian version this way using vegetable stock.

The soup can also be prepared without cream, but then you need 1.2 litres of stock.

Finally, you can also blend the soup to a creamy consistency.

You can serve the soup with toasted white bread croutons, add the cream, stir, bring to the boil and remove from the heat after half a minute. Season with salt as needed. Sprinkle with chopped flat-leaf parsley., In a saucepan over high heat, heat the butter, add the onion and let it foam. Add the grated kohlrabi and sauté for 3 minutes, stirring frequently.
Add the flour, reduce the heat to below half and sauté for 1 minute, stirring constantly.

name: Creamy chicken soup
ingredients: Potatoes type A, B, C, Whole chicken, Freshly crushed pepper, Garlic, Onion, Zucchini, Plain flour, Chicken broth, Butter, Carrots, Chives, Flat-leaf parsley, Transfused butter, Whipping cream (min. 31%), Salt, Fresh and dried thyme
steps: Finely chop the onion and garlic. In a saucepan over medium heat, melt the butter, add the onion and garlic and let them brown. If you do not have cooked chicken meat, you can boil 1-2 chicken breasts in the broth. Then use 1.1 litres of chicken stock in the recipe and, as a first step, cook the meat in the stock until tender. Season with 2 teaspoons salt (or to taste), a pinch of pepper and stir., Add the plain flour and stir-fry for 30 seconds. Pour in the stock, stir, bring to the boil, reduce the heat to a third and cook uncovered for 15 minutes. Stir occasionally to prevent a bubble from forming at the bottom. Pour in the cream, bring to the boil, stir, reduce the heat to a third and cook for a further 5 m

name: Semolina porridge
ingredients: Sugar semolina, Children's semolina, Coffee suitable for this dish, Butter, Milk, Ground cinnamon, Salt
steps:
Pour the milk into a saucepan, add a pinch of salt, the baby semolina and bring to the boil over a low heat, stirring constantly. Stir the porridge all the time so that it does not form lumps that you can never get rid of.

You don't need to heat the butter to flavour the porridge beforehand, it melts beautifully in the hot porridge on its own.

You can also sprinkle the semolina porridge with cocoa and flavour it with apricot compote, for example.

name: Chicken with tomatoes and olives
ingredients: Whole chicken, Black olives without stone, Freshly crushed pepper, Fresh oregano, Fresh thyme, Garlic, Onion, Semolina sugar, Chicken broth, Butter, Olive oil, Tomatoes, Tomato puree, Rice, Dry white wine, Salt, Pasta, Wine suitable for poultry meat, Fresh whole and sliced mushrooms
steps:
Put the roasted meat back into the casserole, skin side up, and place in the preheated oven for 50 minutes.
Take the casserole out of the oven, remove the meat and set it aside. Stir in the oregano, thyme, cooled butter and season with salt if necessary, Cut the chicken into individual parts - cut off the thighs and cut them into 2 parts at the joint. Cut off the wings and separate the squirrels. Cut the breasts and divide them into 2 equal parts. Thoroughly salt and pepper the meat on all sides. Use the chicken carcass and the squirrels to make stock for another dish, Instead of fresh oregano, you can use an aligned teaspoon of dried oregano. In this case, add the dried oregano to the casserole already with the wine, Set the roasted meat aside and add the onion to the casserole. Sauté, stirring frequently, for 1 minute.
Add the mushrooms and sauté for 1 minute. Add the garlic and sauté, stirring frequently, for 1 minute. Add the purée and sugar and stir again.

name: Chicken liver on onion
ingredients: English bacon, Potatoes type A, B, C, Freshly crushed pepper, Onion, Smooth flour, Chicken liver, Chicken broth, Butter, Flat leaf parsley, Rice, Lard, Salt, Pasta, Suitable beer
steps:
You can also season the liver with cumin - add a teaspoon of cumin right away with the onion.

You can improve the taste of the dish by adding 100 ml of cognac. Add it before the broth and let the alcohol boil off for a while, leaving only the strong taste of cognac.

The liver can also make a great liver spread. Add 2 tablespoons of lard after the onions, sauté the liver for a while, do not add the broth, season with salt and pepper, mash the liver lightly with a fork, let it cool and store in a bowl in the fridge.

It tastes great with steamed rice., Put the liver back into the saucepan, increase the heat to high, stir everything, pour the broth and let it cook for 5 minutes or until the liquid boils down to half the volume., Cut the bacon into cubes with an edge of 1 cm. Finely chop the onion. Clean the liver, remove the membranes, dry carefully on kitchen paper and roll in flour. Remove from the heat and stir in the cold butter, which is used to make the sauce.

name: Chicken curry soup with peas
ingredients: Smooth flour, Curry spices, Canned peas, Chicken meat , Chicken broth, Butter, Rolls, Whipping cream (min. 31%), Salt
steps: Cut the chicken meat into cubes with an edge of 1.5 cm., It is best if you use the meat defended from the bones of the chicken parts from which the broth was cooked., Serve with croutons, Add the drained peas, season with salt to taste and let boil for 1 minute., Pour in the stock, stir thoroughly, bring to the boil, reduce the heat to below a third and simmer, stirring occasionally, for 12 minutes. Add the cream and the chopped meat and cook for a further 3 minutes., Cut the croutons into 1 cm cubes, place them in a baking dish, add the butter and place the baking dish in a preheated oven for 12 minutes until the croutons are golden brown. Stir occasionally, Heat the oven to 180 °C., Heat the butter in a saucepan over low heat. Add the flour and cook, stirring constantly, for 2 minutes. Add the curry powder and stir for 1 minute.

name: Cauliflower soup
ingredients: White pepper, Onion, Smooth flour, Cauliflower, Butter, Ground nutmeg, Chives, Whipping cream (min. 31%), Salt
steps:

Put the steaks in the pan and slowly fry them on both sides until golden brown. Add mayonnaise, mustard, 2 teaspoons of salt, 1 teaspoon of freshly ground pepper and mix. Pour in 2 tablespoons of cucumber liqueur and stir. Carefully stir in the chopped eggs. Season with salt and refrigerate for at least 4 hours (preferably overnight).

name: Vegetable broth
ingredients: Bay leaf, Celery, Whole black pepper, Fresh thyme, Onion, Carrot, Allspice, Parsley, Flat-leaved parsley, Leek, Tomatoes, Sunflower oil, Salt, Fresh whole and sliced mushrooms
steps: Strain the finished broth through a fine sieve into a clean pot and cool as quickly as possible by plunging into a sink with ice water. Skim the fat from the cooled broth and discard it., Grate the carrots, celery and parsley coarsely. Cut the leeks lengthwise into quarters and cut them into 0,5 cm thick pieces. Finely chop the onions, mushrooms and tomatoes. Roughly chop the flat-leaved parsley, add the cold water and bring to the boil. Lower the heat to below half, skim the foam from the surface with a ladle and discard it. Add the flat-leaf parsley, thyme, salt and spices, turn the heat down to low and cook slowly uncovered for 45 minutes. Do not stir!, In a saucepan on a higher heat, heat the oil and add the grated carrots, celery and parsley. Stirring frequently, sauté for 2 minutes. Reduce the heat to half, add the leeks, onions, mushrooms and tomatoes and sauté, stirring frequently, for 8 minutes. The broth will lose its flavor and the broth will lose its flavor.

name: Cordon Bleu
ingredients: Potatoes type A, B, C, Plain flour, Chicken breast with wing bone, Transfused butter (ghee), Breadcrumbs, Salt, Ham, Comté or Gruyère cheese, Eggs, Wine suitable for poultry meat
steps: Clean the wing bone from the meat and cut the joint., Salt the meat on all sides and coat it in flour, beaten egg and breadcrumbs. During the frying process, turn the meat and pour the butter from the pan until it is golden brown., Cut the cheese in half and wrap each half in a slice of ham., Cut a pocket in the meat lengthwise.  Place the ham and cheese in the pocket and press the meat so that the package remains completely covered.

name: Asian burger
ingredients: Peanut butter, Baguette, Freshly crushed pepper, Fresh coriander, Red onion, Chilli sauce, Curry powder, Curry spices, Ketchup, Mayonnaise, Butter, Ground beef, Carrots, Vegetable oil, Rice vinegar, Salad cucumber, Sesame oil, Soy sauce, Salt, Wine suitable for beef
steps: Cut the baguettes lengthwise and brush them with butter on the cutting surface. Place them in a preheated oven for 3 minutes, cut the carrot and cucumber lengthwise into thin slices with a peeler. Cut the onion into very fine slices. In a bowl, mix the chopped vegetables with salt, sugar and vinegar., Heat a frying pan over medium heat, brush the meatballs on the flat sides with oil and fry them for 3 minutes on each side. Then put them in the preheated oven for 5 minutes to finish cooking. Take out and leave in a warm place. Place a quarter of the salad on the bottom of the baguette, place 4 meatballs on top, sprinkle with a quarter of the chopped coriander and cover the top of the baguette. In a bowl, mix the meat with salt and spices. Form the mixture into 16 balls and lightly squeeze them.

name: Beef tenderloin Wellington with Madeira sauce
ingredients: English or Dijon mustard, Freshly cracked pepper, Demi-glace, Smooth flour, Beef fillet, Puff pastry, Butter, Portobello, Food foil, Prosciutto, Vegetable oil, Shallots, Salt, Eggs, Madeira wine, Wine suitable for beef, Fresh whole or sliced mushrooms
steps:
English mustard can be replaced by Dijon mustard.

To prepare, you will need an oven-safe needle thermometer and a mixer., Brush the entire dough with beaten egg yolks and leave to cool in the fridge for 15 minutes., Season with salt and pepper and mix., Cut the finished meat straight into portions., Place the mushroom mash in a dry, hot pan and sauté over a high heat, stirring constantly, for 8-10 minutes to evaporate all the liquid from the mushrooms. Season with a pinch of salt and place in a bowl to cool., Peel the mushrooms, cut off the legs and discard. Mix the caps in a blender to a paste., Roll out the puff pastry into a rectangle approximately 3 mm thick., Remove the meat from the fridge and let rest at room temperature for 40 minutes covered with a clean cloth, Remove the meat from the oven and leave to rest at room temperature for 15 minutes.

name: Beef broth

Once the foam stops forming, add an aligned teaspoon of salt, thyme, allspice, peppercorns and bay leaf., Rinse the bones thoroughly under running water and drain., Cut the carrots, parsley and celery into 0.5 cm cubes. Put the roasted bones and meat into a clean pot, pour in about 4 litres of cold water, or so that the meat and bones are submerged, and bring to the boil. Once the water starts to bubble, turn the heat down to low and skim off the foam that starts to form on the surface with a ladle.If you don't buy veal knuckle bones, you can just use beef ribs with the bone. name: Bear garlic soup
ingredients: Potatoes type A, B, C, Onions, Chicken or vegetable stock, Butter, Bear garlic (fresh), Nutmeg, Whipping cream (min. 31%), Dry white wine, Salt
steps:
Finely chop the onion. Cut the potato into larger pieces.
Heat 30 g butter in a saucepan over medium heat, add the onion and let it brown, stirring frequently. Pour in the wine and let it boil off completely. Pour in the stock and bring to the boil. Add the bear garlic, cream, boiled potato, nutmeg and 1 teaspoon salt. Blend the soup while still hot with a stick blender and strain through a fine sieve. Season the soup with salt if necessary., Heat the remaining butter in a pan over high heat. Once it starts to foam slightly golden, set the pan aside and season the soup in the plate with this butter, which has acquired a slight nutty flavour., Always use dry wine. Perhaps a Riesling or Pinot Blanc.

You can also use frozen bear garlic. In that case, you'll need 110 g of it after thawing.

name: Asparagus with hollandaise sauce
ingredients: White wine vinegar, Potatoes type A, B, C, Freshly crushed pepper, White asparagus, Green asparagus, Lemon juice, Semolina sugar, Kitchen twine, Butter, Dry white wine, Salt, Yolk
steps:
Peel the white asparagus and cut off the woody end. Do not peel the green asparagus, just cut the leaves from the stems. Tie the white and green asparagus separately in portions with kitchen twine., Peel the asparagus with an asparagus peeler or potato peeler. Peel from the head down.

You can also break off the woody part - just bend the asparagus properly and the stem will break where the woody part starts. Don't throw away the woody ends, you can use them in soup or stock.

Fresh asparagus is full of water. You can tell freshness by the way the stems squeak when rubbed together.

When cooking asparagus, only the stems should be submerged in the water, the heads should be sticking out of the water. If they are submerged, pour off some of the water. At the last minute of boiling, submerge the heads as well. Place the bowl with the egg yolks on top of the saucepan so that the bottom of the bowl does not touch the surface of the water and stir with a whisk

name: Lamb on marjoram with potato gnocchi
ingredients: Potato starch, Boiling potatoes type C, Fresh marjoram, Freshly crushed pepper, Garlic, Onion, Coarse flour, Leg of lamb, Chicken stock, Butter, Lard, Whipping cream (min. 31%), Salt, Eggs, Suitable beer
steps:
Finely chop the onion. Peel and crush the garlic. Blanch the meat, discard most of the fat and cut into 1,5 cm cubes. To the grated potatoes add the starch, flour, egg, 10 g salt and mix as quickly as possible with a rolling pin to make a soft but compact dough. On a floured board, roll out the dough into a roll 2-2.5 cm in diameter, which you cut into gnocchi 2-3 cm long. It will smell better.

Once the chilled butter has been added, the sauce must no longer boil. This technique will make the sauce softer and thicker.

steps:
In a large pot boil well-salted water for gnocchi., On a floured table or a rolling pin roll out a roll of dough with a diameter of 2-2.5 cm, which we cut into gnocchi 2-3 cm long. Cook for 6-7 minutes. Take the finished gnocchi out of the water with a perforated ladle and put them on a baking tray with hot lard, in which they are covered so that they do not turn brown. Therefore, add the flour gradually to obtain the ideal consistency. Potato dough tends to thin out, so you have to work quickly.

The potatoes must be completely cooled before you start working the potato dough.

Don't cook the potatoes until they are completely tender - the batter will then be runny.

name: Judas
ingredients: Fresh yeast, granulated sugar, Flour, Coffee suitable for this dish, Butter, Honey, Milk, Baking paper, Semi-coarse flour, Salt, Eggs
steps: After baking, brush with liquid honey generously while still hot.Do not pull the spirals, otherwise they will rise too high in the oven.Divide the dough into 80 g pieces and roll them into 20 cm long rolls. Twist them into a spiral and hide the end under the dough to prevent them from unravelling. Place them on a baking sheet lined with baking paper, cover with a clean tea towel and leave in a warm place to rise for 45 minutes. Then brush the yiddish with beaten egg, place in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes. Stir in the flour, a little at a time, until it forms a batter about as thick as pancakes. Dust the surface with plain flour and leave in a warm place for 30 minutes to rise., Heat the oven to 160 °C., Melt the butter in a saucepan over a low heat. Add the butter to the bowl with the omelette.

name: Mazanec
ingredients: Fresh yeast, Lemon, Semolina sugar, Smooth flour, Coffee suitable for this dish, Almonds, Almond slices, Butter, Milk, Baking paper, Semi-coarse flour, Raisins, Salt, Vanilla sugar, Eggs
steps:
Roll the rested dough into a loaf (i.e. tighten it properly so that it holds its shape during rising and baking), place it on a baking sheet lined with baking paper and leave it in a warm place for at least 1 hour to rise.

Do not underestimate the maturing of the dough, at this point the flavours are coming together, the dough is beginning to proof and
is gaining energy. If you give it a rest, it will process well later.

If you let the dough rise thoroughly, it will hold its shape in the oven and not tear.

Grate only the yellow part of the lemon peel, the white is bitter.

You can tell when the dough is baked by sticking a skewer in the centre and pulling it out, it will stay dry. If there is dough on the skewer when you pull it out, bake for a while.

name: Stuffed eggs
ingredients: Anchovies, White pepper, Lemon juice, Luchina, Mayonnaise, Chives, Full fat mustard, Tomatoes, Anchovy paste, Salt, Eggs, Lettuce
steps:
Place the stuffed eggs on a bowl lined with lettuce leaves. Decorate with anchovies and a piece of tomato.If you want to lighten the filling, add one finely chopped egg white.

You can put the egg yolk filling in a pastry bag, it will be easier to work with., Fill the egg whites into the yolk wells with the mixture., Peel the eggs, cut them lengthwise and remove the yolks., Beat the yolks in a bowl with the luchina, mayonnaise, mustard and anchovy paste. Add the finely chopped chives. Season with salt, white pepper and lemon juice and stir.

name: Egg spread
ingredients: White yoghurt, Freshly cracked pepper, Whole milk mustard, Salt, Eggs, Jelly
steps:
You can replace part of the full-fat mustard with Dijon mustard, the spread will have a sharper taste.

You don't have to cut all the egg whites into the spread, you can fill some of them with the spread.

You can add finely chopped flat-leaf parsley or chives to the spread., Add the chopped egg whites, mix and chill in the fridge., Boil the eggs, peel and cut lengthwise. Scrape the yolks into a bowl, finely chop the whites, mash the yolks with a fork, add the cress, yoghurt, mustard, salt and pepper and mix.

name: Egg salad with potatoes
ingredients: Potatoes, cooking type A, Freshly cracked pepper, Spring onion, Mayonnaise, Full fat mustard, Salt, Eggs
steps: Boil the potatoes in their skins until tender and let them cool. You can add chopped chives or flat-leaved parsley to the salad., Peel the eggs and cooled potatoes and cut them into 1 cm cubes. Mix the eggs, potatoes and onions with the mayonnaise and mustard. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Chill in the fridge.

name: Easter Lamb
ingredients: Caster sugar, Coarse flour, Coffee suitable for this dish, Butter, Milk, Semi-coarse flour, Baking powder, Eggs
steps:
Let the finished lamb cool in the mould before turning it out, the amount of dough is for a smaller mould.

All ingredients must be at the same temperature so that the dough does not separate the fat (it should have fine crumbs in it). The dough may then shrink in the mould during baking and not rise.

If this does happen, don't despair. Place the bowl with the dough in a warm water bath and rub until the fat dissolves and combines with the other ingredients to form a smooth dough again, Mix the flour with the baking powder. Beat the butter with the sugar until foamy, stir in the eggs and milk and finally the flour and baking powder., Pour the batter into the prepared tin, place in the preheated oven and bake for 60 minutes., Preheat the oven to 160 °C. Butter the tin and dust it thoroughly with coarse flour.

name: Asparagus, tomato and walnut salad
ingredients: Fresh basil, Fresh thyme, Red and yellow cherry tomatoes, Green asparagus, Lemon, Lemon juice, Semolina sugar, Extra virgin olive oil, Hazelnuts, Honey, Shelled almonds, Tomatoes, Raisins, Salt, Dried cranberries, Salad wine, Walnuts
steps:
Cut the cherry tomatoes in half. Cut out the hard centres from the large tomatoes, cut the tomatoes into quarters and halves.Arrange the hazelnuts, walnuts and almonds in a single layer on a baking tray and place in a preheated oven for 6 minutes. Then transfer them from the baking tray to a bowl and leave to cool. The salad will have a stronger nutty flavour. You can also use a combination of olive and hazelnut oil.

Instead of the classic red tomatoes, you can use the green or yellow variety. The different varieties can be combined in the salad.

The older the asparagus is, the longer the lower part of its stem becomes woody. This part must be cut off. name: Asparagus soup
ingredients: White asparagus, Green asparagus, Semolina sugar, Butter, Whipping cream (min. 31%), Salt
steps:
Place the asparagus in boiling water and cook for 5-10 minutes to bite. Note, green asparagus is done faster. Immediately after cooking, place the green asparagus in a bowl of water and ice to stop the boiling and prevent the asparagus from wilting. Then cut the asparagus into 4 cm long spears, in a pan over medium heat, let the remaining butter and the white asparagus heads foam and briefly heat the cut green asparagus in it. Return the warmed asparagus to the soup and drizzle the soup in the plate with the remaining butter from the pan, pour in the cream, stir and let it come to a boil. Remove from the heat and whisk in 60 g of butter. Season with salt., The cooked green asparagus must be immediately immersed in ice water so that it does not continue to cook - it will retain its colour and remain crisp.

You can also serve the soup with croutons made from white bread - just cut a day-old roll or bun into cubes and fry them in butter.

name: Asparagus with butter breadcrumbs
ingredients: White asparagus, Semolina sugar, Kitchen twine, Butter, Breadcrumbs, Salt
steps:
Peel the asparagus from the head down. This way you won't break off the head.

You can also break off the woody part - just bend the asparagus properly and the stem will break where the woody part starts. Don't throw away the woody ends, you can use them for soup or stock.

It is very important to peel white asparagus very carefully, as it has a very tough skin which is not edible and will only get in the way when eaten.

Fresh asparagus is full of water. You can tell when it is fresh by the way the stalks squeak when rubbed together.

When cooking asparagus, only the stems should be submerged in the water, the heads should be sticking out of the water. If they are submerged, pour off some of the water. At the last minute of boiling, dip the asparagus heads into the water.

The breadcrumbs will darken quickly, be careful not to burn them. It should be stirred constantly while roasting in the pan. Overcooked, dark breadcrumbs have a bitter taste., Peel the asparagus carefully and cut off the woody end. Tie the asparagus into kitchen portions

name: Asparagus risotto
ingredients: Freshly cracked pepper, Green asparagus, Butter, Olive oil, Whole Parmesan cheese, Rice for risotto, Shallots, Dry white wine, Salt, Wine suitable for starters
steps:
Cut the asparagus heads in half lengthwise. Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a frying pan over high heat, add the asparagus and sauté, stirring constantly, for 1,5 minutes. Remove from the heat and season with a pinch of salt and pepper. Once the water is almost boiled, add more water, again just enough to submerge the rice. Let it boil again and continue this way until the rice is cooked al dente (to the bite). This usually takes 16-20 minutes. Stir very often!!!When the last of the water is half cooked off and the rice is soft to the bite, remove from the heat, stir in the parmesan cheese and stir in the cubes of cooled butter and then 3 tablespoons of olive oil, cut the butter into small cubes and return to the fridge. steps: Meanwhile, prepare the chimichurri sauce. Mix a handful of flat-leaf parsley, 2 tablespoons oregano, chilli pepper, 2 cloves garlic, salt, pepper, 1 teaspoon wine vinegar and olive oil. Mix everything together, salt, pepper and drizzle the steak with olive oil at room temperature. Grill for 3-5 minutes on each side. Transfer from the grill to a plate and let it rest for 7 more minutes, Serve the steak with the chimichurri sauce.

name: Beef cheeseburger
ingredients: Beef, Red Onion, Ketchup, Mayonnaise, Ground Beef, Sliced Cheddar, Tomatoes, Lettuce
steps:
The burgers should be a little bigger than the bun, flatten the meat a little in the middle, as it will bulge slightly when grilled, and this way it will stay nice and flat. Place the meat at room temperature on a well heated grill coated with a little oil. For medium-rare, you only need to grill the meat for 3 minutes on each side, but it depends on its thickness and your taste. After turning, put a slice of cheese on top of the meat to melt it. Don't forget to lightly toast the sliced bun on the grill.Good burgers just need good quality beef, salt and pepper, so we use already mixed meat directly from the butcher.Then spread the bun with mayonnaise, ketchup or a combination of both, add the browned burger meat and other ingredients to taste, such as sliced tomato, onion and lettuce. Cover with bun, slice if necessary and serve immediately, do not place lettuce under the meat or it will wilt quickly.

Slices of crispy bacon are also excellent in a burger. However, fry the bacon for a long time.

name: Alsatian pizza
ingredients: Freshly ground pepper, Fresh yeast, Red onion, Crème Fraîche, Flour, Butter, Nutmeg, Baking paper, Food foil, Bacon, Salt, Suitable beer
steps: Heat the grill to high and cover it.Sprinkle each piece of dough with flour and roll out a 2 mm thick rectangle. Place on the baking paper, spread with a higher layer of crème fraîche, sprinkle with some of the onion and bacon and pepper., Transfer the prepared dough from the baking paper to the hot grill, cover and grill for 3 minutes. Mix the crème fraîche, salt and nutmeg. Cut the onion and bacon into 3 mm thick noodles., Mix the yeast and water (250 ml) in a bowl and pour it into the bowl of the food processor. Add the flour and softened butter and mix on medium speed for 8 minutes until smooth. Form into a ball, wrap in cling film and place in the fridge for 1 hour. Divide the rested dough into 4 equal parts.

name: Burger with pork
ingredients: Baguette, Freshly crushed pepper, Fresh coriander, Garlic, Chilli sauce, Sriracha, Chinese cabbage, Spring onion, Mayonnaise, Ground pork, Carrots, Vegetable oil, Rice vinegar, Sesame oil, Soy sauce, Salt, Ginger, Wine suitable for grilling

steps: Add the crushed garlic, a pinch of salt, rosemary and lemon juice to the olive oil, cut the meat lengthwise into 6 strips. Serve with dips, tzatziki, sauces to taste or green salad mixed with cherry tomatoes and drizzled with olive oil.

ingredients: Garlic, Chilli powder, Chicken hearts, Lime, Olive oil, Black pepper , Vegetable oil, Skewers, Salt, Wine suitable for grilling
steps:

Place the hearts on the skewers. Place them on a hot grill and grill for 2-2,5 minutes on each side. In a bowl, mix 60 ml of oil, garlic, chilli, salt and pepper. Add the hearts, mix and refrigerate for 30 minutes.

name: Leg of lamb with mint sauce

steps: Wash the mint leaves, dry them, chop them and put them in a larger bowl. Add the sugar and 200 ml of boiling water. Stir thoroughly and leave to cool at room temperature. Then brush with oil and season generously with salt and pepper. Place the meat in a baking dish lined with baking paper. Place the baking dish in a preheated oven and bake for 2 hours until tender. Let the finished meat rest for 10 minutes before serving. Dip individual bites of meat in mint sauce, add wine vinegar, stir and let rest for 1 hour. If the sauce is too hot, add water., Cut the rosemary into 2 cm long pieces. Cut the garlic lengthwise into 3 parts, Heat the oven to 160 ˚C.

name: Chicken alla diavola

steps: Finely chop the fresh chillies, coarsely crush the dried chillies. Mix all the ingredients thoroughly in a bowl., Cut the chickens along the spine and lay them out like a book. Toss them thoroughly with the marinade and leave them in the fridge for at least 3 hours, but preferably overnight., Remove the chickens from the marinade, place them skin side down on the hot grill, cover and grill for 3 minutes. Then turn them over, cover the grill again and grill for another 3 minutes. Continue like this until the chickens are tender.

name: Salmon in papillote

steps: Cut the celery and carrots into fine noodles. Cut the onion into thin crescents. Cut the spring onions into thin rounds. Cut the potatoes lengthwise. Mix all the vegetables in a bowl. Similarly, fold the sides over several times to create a closed pocket. Place it on the hot grill. Once puffed up, pull it down to the edge of the grill to a lower heat and grill for 1 minute. Remove from the grill and let rest for half a minute. Slice the papillote and serve immediately., Cut the salmon into 4 mm thick slices, lay them crosswise on the vegetables and pepper. Season the potatoes with salt and add to the sides of the fish. Pour in one tablespoon of oil and 2 tablespoons of wine. Place some of the chopped vegetables and one sprig of thyme on it.

name: Quesadillas with chicken
ingredients: Fresh Cilantro, Red Peppers, Guacamole, Corn Tortillas, Boneless Chicken Thighs, Olive Oil, Jalapeño Peppers, Sliced Cheddar, Tomatoes, Bacon, Salt, BBQ Wine, Sour Cream
steps: You can prepare guacamole according to Roman Vanek's recipe, which you can find on X Chef in the category of fruits, vegetables and mushrooms. Salt the meat on both sides, place on a hot grill and grill both sides until tender. Place the finished meat on a cutting board and let rest for 3 minutes. Then cut it into slices 0,5 cm thick., On half of each tortilla put part of the tomatoes, on them part of the sliced meat, peppers, coriander and 1 tablespoon of guacamole. Add a jalapeño pepper on top to taste. Add some of the bacon and 1 slice of cheese and fold each tortilla in half., Serve with sour cream and guacamole., Slice the tomatoes. Slice the jalapeño peppers into thin slices. Clean the peppers, remove the seeds and cut the flesh into 0,5 cm thick noodles. Grill the bacon on a hot grill until golden brown, place the tortillas on the hot grill, cover and grill for 2 minutes.

name: Tomato salsa
ingredients: Fresh basil, Fresh thyme, Red chilli, Red onion, Red wine vinegar, Garlic, Lemon juice, Olive oil, Flat leaf parsley, Tomatoes, Salt
steps: Finely chop the onion. Peel the garlic, cut lengthwise, remove the central sprout and finely grate or press. Finely chop the chilli pepper, mix the onion with the vinegar, lemon juice and garlic. Add the chopped tomatoes, herbs and oil., Add salt and chilli pepper to taste and mix., Cut the tomatoes into quarters and cut out the hard centre including the seeds. Cut the flesh into small cubes.

name: Greek bifteki
ingredients: Freshly cracked pepper, Fresh oregano, Red onion, Lemon zest, Mint, Ground beef, Flat-leaf parsley, Salt, Feta cheese, Toasted bread, Eggs, Wine suitable for grilling
steps:
Finely chop the onion. Finely chop the mint, parsley and oregano. Put the toasted bread in a bowl and pour 50 ml of water over it. Add the herbs, onion, a pinch of pepper, 1 teaspoon salt, lemon zest, egg and minced meat and mix thoroughly. Remember, the more fatty parts you leave on the lamb, the more pronounced the flavour will be.

Serve with tzatziki, cherry tomatoes and marigolds of finely chopped red onion., Place on a medium hot grill and grill for 2-3 minutes on each side until golden brown., Divide the mixture into 6 portions. Form each part into an oval patty, place a block of cheese in the middle and wrap the meat in an oval doughnut.

name: Souvlaki

steps: Place the finished skewers on a plate, drizzle with the remaining olive oil and the juice of the grilled lemon. Soak the skewers in cold water for 10 minutes., Cut the meat into 3 cm cubes, put them in a bowl with the herbs, 3 tablespoons of oil, a pinch of salt and pepper and mix. Let it rest for 2 hours in the fridge., Remove the meat from the marinade and skewer it on skewers. Place the skewers on a hot grill and grill them gradually for 1½ minutes on each side until the meat is tender. Place the lemon cut side down on the grill with the skewers.

name: Tzatziki
ingredients: White Greek yoghurt, Fresh dill, Garlic, Lemon juice, Extra virgin olive oil, Cucumber, Salt
steps: Cut the garlic lengthwise and take out the tough sprouts, which are discarded. Finely chop the garlic, squeeze the drained cucumber, mix in a bowl with the yoghurt, garlic, dill, lemon juice and olive oil. Chill in the fridge for 2 hours. Stir before serving, cut both ends off the cucumber and cut it lengthwise. Using a spoon, scrape out the seeds and coarsely grate the cucumber. Put it in a colander, place it on a plate and season the cucumber with salt. Stir and let stand for 10 minutes, the cucumber will release the water.

name: Honey-mustard marinade
ingredients: Freshly crushed pepper, Garlic, Lemon juice, Dijon mustard, Extra virgin olive oil, Honey, Fresh rosemary, Salt
steps: Marinate the beef or pork in the mixture until the next day.Mix the mustard with honey, olive oil, crushed or chopped garlic, lemon juice, salt and freshly ground pepper. Add a handful of chopped herbs (one kind or a mix of rosemary, thyme and tarragon), then grill the marinated meat as you are used to.

name: Grilled vegetable skewers
ingredients: Fresh herbs, Freshly crushed pepper, Red onion, Red pepper, Garlic, Cherry tomatoes, Lemon juice, Zucchini, Olive oil, Salt
steps:
Cut the cleaned vegetables into evenly sized pieces so that they toast evenly and skewer them on the grill needles.Mix the oil with lemon juice, pressed garlic, chopped herbs to taste (thyme, oregano, sage, basil, parsley, mint...), salt and freshly ground pepper. If you use wooden skewers, soak them in cold water for 30 minutes so they don't catch on the grill.

You can also skewer other goodies such as corn, asparagus, mushrooms, brussels sprouts, or pieces of tofu, tempeh or halloumi cheese.
